thread.title: Manchester United news: Zlatan Ibrahimovic reveals talks with Anthony Martial | Metro News
thread.title_full: Manchester United news: Zlatan Ibrahimovic reveals talks with Anthony Martial | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Manchester United news: Zlatan Ibrahimovic reveals talks with Anthony Martial | Metro News
text:
Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 12:03 pm Zlatan Ibrahimovic has been speaking with Anthony Martial (Picture: Getty) 
Manchester United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic has revealed he’s been talking with his team-mate Anthony Martial over breakfasts at the club training ground in a bid to help him improve this season. 
The French starlet has failed to build on a superb debut season at Old Trafford, during which he finished as United’s top scorer despite arriving as a virtual unknown that summer. Paul Pogba shows brotherly love after Florentin is forced off injured 
Ibrahimovic joined the Red Devils with a very different reputation, and is now using his experience at the top level to guide the club’s young players. 
The 35-year-old feels Martial has huge potential and has dealt well with being out of the side more often than it under new manager Jose Mourinho this season. Ibrahimovic has a wealth of experience to pass on (Picture: Getty) 
‘When we eat breakfast and he is beside me or if he passes me, we talk,’ Ibrahimovic explained. 
‘I think everyone talks to everyone. It is not like you try to cheer him up; it is a good atmosphere and the guys are all good guys, very professional. Manchester United fixtures
